Sentencas: The CO(2 )methanation becomes promising solution to mitigate global warming and energy issues.
Titulo: CO2 methanation over nickel-based catalyst supported on yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Yttriastabilized zirconia (YSZ) has been utilized for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) applications.
Titulo: CO2 methanation over nickel-based catalyst supported on yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: However, few researches about the use of YSZ as nickel-based catalyst support for CO2 methanation.
Titulo: CO2 methanation over nickel-based catalyst supported on yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Herein, we investigated the catalytic performance of 60wt%NiO-40wt%YSZ.
Titulo: CO2 methanation over nickel-based catalyst supported on yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The results showed that 60wt%NiO-40wt%YSZ produced methane with almost 100% selectivity and stable during more than 220 h. It confirms the excellent performance of 60wt%NiO-40wt%YSZ catalyst.
Titulo: CO2 methanation over nickel-based catalyst supported on yttria-stabilized zirconia
